publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3007 Colin Campbell: Anti-social Behaviour Orders—That the Parliament believes that anti-social behaviour orders are not working effectively and that many social housing providers are having difficulty implementing policies and procedures to deal speedily with tenants’ complaints and, in order to meet the needs of complainants, calls upon the Scottish Executive to take urgent action at the earliest possible opportunity to deal with anti-social behaviour.

S1M-3007 Colin Campbell: Anti-social Behaviour Orders-That the Parliament believes that anti-social behaviour orders are not working effectively and that many social housing providers are having difficulty implementing policies and procedures to deal speedily with tenants' complaints and, in order to meet the needs of complainants, calls upon the Scottish Executive to take urgent action at the earliest possible opportunity to deal with anti-social behaviour.
S1M-3007 Anti-social Behaviour Orders (lodged on 18 April 2002) Brian Adam*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3007 Anti-social Behaviour Orders (lodged on 18 April 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Andrew Wilson*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Matheson*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-3007 Anti-social Behaviour Orders (lodged on 18 April 2002) Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3007 Anti-social Behaviour Orders (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Russell*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3007 Anti-social Behaviour Orders (lodged on 18 April 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3007 Anti-social Behaviour Orders (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
